SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into commentinfo (userId, fabiao_id, url, score, creatStamp, `status`, content) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fabiaoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=REAL}, #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select commentId, userId, fabiao_id, url, score, creatStamp, `status`, content from commentinfo
